auth.authRequiredMessage: You need to connect your wallet to create recommendations and earn tokens.
auth.connectWalletPrompt: Please connect your wallet before creating recommendations
auth.upgradeMessage: Connect a wallet to claim your earned tokens and access full features.

trustMode.title: Recommendation Mode

descriptions.trust: See recommendations from people you follow and friends-of-friends, ranked by social trust
descriptions.global: See all public recommendations ranked by global popularity (may contain unverified reviews)

trust.title: Trust Mode (Recommended)
trust.socialNetwork: Shows recommendations from your social network
trust.filtersFake: Filters out fake reviews and AI-generated content
trust.personalized: Personalized based on people you trust

global.title: Global Mode
global.mayIncludeFake: May include fake or AI-generated content

socialNetwork.title: Your Social Network
socialNetwork.followMoreTip: üí° Follow more users to get better Trust Mode recommendations!

trustMode.privacy: Privacy: Your recommendation preferences are stored locally. Social connections are encrypted and you control who sees your network.

connection.fallback: IOTA limited mode - basic functionality available

toast.reportSent: Report sent. Thank you for your feedback!

empty.title: No comments yet
empty.description: Be the first to share your thoughts!

empty.title: No notifications yet
empty.description: We'll notify you when something happens!

toast.markReadError: Failed to mark notification as read
toast.markAllReadError: Failed to mark all as read

welcome.title: Welcome to BocaBoca!
welcome.subtitle: Let's set up your profile so you can start discovering and sharing amazing dining experiences.

username.label: Choose your username
username.hint: Letters, numbers, and underscores only. At least 3 characters.
username.invalidFormat: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores
username.tooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters

info.title: Why do I need a username?
info.description: Your username is how other food lovers will find and follow you on BocaBoca. It's part of your unique identity in our community of taste explorers!

toast.saveFailed: Failed to save username. Please try again.

location.title: Where are you based?
location.subtitle: This helps us show you restaurants and recommendations near you

info.title: Why do we need your location?
info.description: Knowing your city helps us show you relevant restaurants and connect you with local food enthusiasts. You can always change this later in settings.

toast.selectLocation: Please select or enter a location
toast.saveFailed: Failed to save location. Please try again.

taste.title: Rate 3 places you love
taste.subtitle: Help us understand your taste preferences so we can give you better recommendations

info.title: Why rate restaurants?
info.description: Your ratings help us understand your taste preferences and recommend places you'll actually love. The more you rate, the smarter our recommendations become!

follow.title: Connect with food enthusiasts
follow.subtitle: Follow people whose taste you trust to get personalized recommendations

info.title: Why follow people?
info.description: Following food enthusiasts with similar taste helps you discover great places through trusted recommendations. You'll see their posts in your feed and can easily find places they love!

firstRec.title: Share your first recommendation!
firstRec.subtitle: Tell the community about a place you love and help others discover great food

place.title: The place
place.description: Restaurant name and location so others can find it

loved.title: What you loved
loved.description: Specific dishes, ambiance, service - what made it special?

photos.title: Photos (optional)
photos.description: Pictures help others see what to expect

example.label: Example recommendation
example.title: Amazing Pasta at Trattoria Moderna! üçù
example.content: The Cacio e Pepe here is perfection - creamy, peppery, with perfectly al dente pasta. Cozy atmosphere and attentive service. Great for date nights!

encouragement.title: You're almost there!
encouragement.description: Your first recommendation helps us understand your taste and lets you start earning BOCA tokens for valuable contributions. The community is excited to hear your thoughts!

toast.skipped: You can create your first recommendation anytime!

header.userNotFoundDescription: The user you're looking for doesn't exist or has been deactivated.

recommendations.own: You haven't created any recommendations yet
recommendations.ownDescription: Share your favorite places and experiences to build your reputation
recommendations.otherDescription: This user hasn't shared any recommendations yet

reshares.ownDescription: Reshare recommendations to share them with your followers
reshares.otherDescription: This user hasn't reshared any recommendations yet

lists.own: You haven't created any guides yet
lists.ownDescription: Create curated guides to share with others
lists.otherDescription: This user hasn't created any guides yet

likes.own: You haven't liked any recommendations yet
likes.otherDescription: This user hasn't liked any recommendations yet

bookmarks.own: You haven't created any lists yet
bookmarks.otherDescription: This user hasn't created any lists yet

followers.own: You don't have any followers yet
followers.ownDescription: Share great recommendations to attract followers
followers.otherDescription: This user hasn't gained any followers yet

following.ownDescription: Start following food experts to see their recommendations
following.otherDescription: This user hasn't followed anyone yet

intro.description: Complete your profile to start earning tokens and building trust in the community.

balance.title: Your BOCA Balance
balance.description: Earned through platform engagement and contributions

attribution.title: Attribution Rewards
attribution.description: You earn 0.1 BOCA each time someone reshares your recommendations

onboardingProgress.title: Onboarding Progress
onboardingProgress.keepEngaging: Keep engaging with the platform to earn more rewards

activity.title: User Activity
activity.description: View this user's recent platform activity and interactions

backup.title: Account Backup & Recovery
backup.description: Secure your account with backup options and recovery settings

modal.title: Ask for Recommendations
modal.subtitle: Get help finding the perfect spot

title.label: What are you looking for?
title.placeholder: e.g., Best Italian for anniversary dinner?

description.label: Additional Details
description.placeholder: Tell us more about what you're looking for... dietary needs, group size, special requirements, etc.

location.label: Location
location.placeholder: e.g., Asa Sul, Downtown, Near Shopping Center

createRequest.tip: üí° Tip: The more details you provide, the better recommendations you'll receive from the community!

validation.titleRequired: Please enter a title for your request
validation.titleTooShort: Title must be at least 10 characters
validation.loginRequired: Please log in to create a request

tip.title: Filter Tip:
tip.description: Use filters to find exactly what you're looking for. Trust Score shows recommendations based on your social network - the higher the score, the more people you trust have recommended the place!

cta.title: Create your own list
cta.description: Earn tokens by sharing your favorite food discoveries

breakdown.title: Trust Breakdown
breakdown.weightExplanation: Direct friends count as 0.75x weight, friends-of-friends as 0.25x weight in Trust Score calculation.

search.placeholder: Search restaurants by name, cuisine, or location...

errors.loadFailed: Failed to load restaurants. Please try again.
errors.locationFailed: Could not get your location. Please enable location services.
errors.geolocationNotSupported: Geolocation is not supported by your browser.
errors.checkApiKey: Failed to load Google Maps. Please check your API key.

footer.hint: Pan and zoom to explore ‚Ä¢ Markers show Trust Scores from your network, not external ratings

trustScore.label: Trust Score
trustScore.tooltipFull: Based on {count} recommendations from people in your social network, weighted by social proximity and reputation.
trustScore.tooltipShort: Based on {count} recommendations from people in your social network.

intro.contentUpgrade: You've earned {tokens} TOK! Connect your wallet to claim them and start earning more.
intro.contentFirstTime: Connect your wallet to earn tokens for helpful recommendations and participate in the trust network.

benefits.title: Why Connect a Wallet?
benefits.content: A Web3 wallet gives you ownership and control while enabling token rewards.

security.title: Safe & Secure
security.content: We prioritize your security and never access your funds.

benefits.startEarning: Start earning tokens for future recommendations
benefits.dataControl: Your data stays under your control
benefits.buildReputation: Build your reputation in the trust network
benefits.portableReputation: Build reputation that follows you everywhere

security.noPrivateKeys: We never store your private keys

connection.connectToUnlock: Connect your wallet to unlock your earned tokens

securityReminder.title: Your Security is Our Priority
securityReminder.description: We use industry-standard wallet connection protocols. Your private keys stay in your wallet, and we never initiate transactions without your explicit approval.

success.title: Restaurant added!
success.message: The restaurant has been added to the database and is being verified.

search.error: Error searching restaurants. Please try again.

addMode.title: Add New Restaurant
addMode.description: Help build the community database by adding restaurants you want to recommend.

validation.addressTooShort: Please provide a more detailed address
validation.locationRequired: Location is required - use GPS or enter manually

geolocation.notSupported: Geolocation is not supported by your browser

autocomplete.minCharsHint: Type at least 2 characters to search

detail.noRecommendations: No recommendations yet. Be the first to recommend this place!

form.descriptionPlaceholder: What's this list about? Help others understand the theme...

publish.title: Publish as Guide

infoBanner.title: Convert your private list into a public guide
infoBanner.description: Your list will become discoverable by others. You can edit or unpublish it anytime.

title.label: Guide Title
title.placeholder: e.g., Best Date Night Restaurants in Bras√≠lia

description.label: Description
description.placeholder: Describe your guide... (This will be the main content readers see)
description.hintPrefilled: Pre-filled from your notes. Edit as needed.
description.hintEmpty: Add a description to help readers understand what makes this guide special.

bestFor.label: Best For (Optional)
bestFor.placeholder: e.g., Date nights, Family dinners, Solo dining

tags.label: Tags (Optional)
tags.hint: Separate tags with commas. These help people discover your guide.

publish.footerNote: Your original list will remain private

validation.emptyList: Cannot publish an empty guide. Add at least one restaurant.

errors.notLoggedIn: You must be logged in to publish a guide. Please log in and try again.
errors.publishFailed: Failed to publish guide. Please try again.
